website_summaries.verdict: This stunningly designed sleigh bed sports hand-crafted chrome nailhead trim, plush velvet covering, and a durable frame.
pros: Available in twin through king sizes
cons: Takes approximately 1 to 2 hours to build this sleigh bed

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and well built bed. Assembly took about 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and well built bed. Assembly took about 2 hours; all tools are hardware included. I was skeptical to purchase because there were no reviews and there were no pictures of the frame part. You don't need a box spring with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Fairly easy to put together and very sturdy. Took my husband about an hour. No need for a box spring and mattress is about a foot and a half off the ground. Headboard is padded and bed is a velvet type material. Take the plunge. You won't be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bed!! It’s everything I hoped for. It came in perfect condition. Great quality, fabric is extremely soft, color is absolutely beautiful. More of a blueish gray then true neutral gray which I’m happier with. It took about 3-4 hours to put together by myself. Had a little trouble with some of the bolts screwing in but then instructions were easy to understand. I recommend having another person help assemble it if possible. Definitely pleased with my purchase! Excuse my messy bed in the pictures. :)
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed and comes with what you need to put it together. No box string needed.
customer_reviews.author: The Photo Guy CR

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful and strong bed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful and strong bed. It came with 2 big boxes. Need 2 ppl and took 2 hours to assemble it. The quality of the bed look so luxury and good for the price. Ive wanted to buy the king size bad for a long time, and I’m happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hsu

customer_reviews.title: I would like my money back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed based on the reviews, but when we received it, ours didn't look as nice as the pictures. It's made of cheap material (very cheap- headboard) and our headboard didn't fit well with the rest of the bed, so you can see that the bed doesn't look right. It was about 5 inches too big to go with the sides of the bed. I wish I had bought a bed from American Signature. I don't like to write negative reviews, but this one was so disappointing. Now I'm stuck with a $480 bed that I don't even like to look at it. No one has used it yet. I would like to have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BED!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Looks exactly like the picture! I bought the King size Navy Blue bed and it is just lovely. Beautiful soft velvety fabric. This is exactly what I needed. All the beds I could find on Amazon with extravagant tall headboards were made of a burlap type of fabric, which my cat would love to scratch. This is the only bed I could find that wasn't almost 1k and beautiful. Just love this bed...buy it if you can! Delivery was smooth and my husband put it together in about an hour. Just about anyone can put this bed together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and extremely nice bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the King size in Black and it is exactly as pictured! I have no complaints. My item arrived a bit damaged in the back of the frame but nothing major or noticeable. Shipping was on time and delivery staff was very friendly and careful with item! Thank you to seller and delivery guys. I put the bed up myself and it took me a couple of hours. I enjoyed the final look. You can use box springs or just use the mattress, either way it's a nice frame!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up, minor issues...
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and quality of velvet of this bed. I’m taking away one star because it arrived with one screw missing that was necessary for assembly. The color in the photo for the Cream shade also isn’t accurate. It’s lighter and warmer than the picture appears. More like a buttercream shade as opposed to a light flax-ivory. I do like the shade that is advertised better but it’s too much of a hassle to send the bed back. I’ll make due. It is a beautiful and sturdy bed. It took about an hour 1/2 to assemble and the instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: rachel g

customer_reviews.title: The middle frame collapsed within a couple days.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is nice aesthetically but when it comes to actual quality of the support it’s not so good. The middle frame of the bed collapsed only days into having the bed set up. I am now forced to by a separate frame from another store and now I need a box spring as well. Overall disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful. It looks extremely expensive. The velvet is a great quality. It was easy to put together by myself and with help from my 5 and 12 year old nieces with them holding pieces in place. I would purchase again in a heartbeat. My sister is jealous because she ordered a headboard from a different site and it isn't the same quality. Will update with pics soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Hate ASSEMBLING it!
customer_reviews.text: Bed looks good but assembly is so much frustrating. Holes are not rightly cut and screws do not go inside well. As a result, needs much more strength to screw these. I have been assembling it for past 3 hours and still need more time. Also, one of the screws was of smaller size than others so could not screw it. Will go to Home depot to buy proper size screw tomorrow. Also, some metal parts came bent and attaching them to bed was other hassel. I am so frustrated as I write this. Need to get back to assembling this bed before my husband comes back from work as he is so desperate to see this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Urmila

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!! Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk broke after few months, trying to get a hold of manufacturer and they don’t even provide a phone number to get into contact with them so that alone is a red flag. On their site, you are only able to contact them by sending an inquiry online but after a month they still have not responded. Bed looks nice but does not last, waste of money. I would give 0 if I could
customer_reviews.author: Marlene duarte

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my bed! It just set my room off! Took more than the 3 to 5 days to arrive though.. Packaging was damaged upon arrival so I thought my frame would be too, but everything was fine and all parts were there. Took me about 2 hrs unboxing and assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Shavelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Diagonal frame.
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered to me over a month ago. It sat in its box until I was done with some renovations around the house. When I finally got around to building it, I noticed the frame was diagonal, I loosened every bolt and re tighten es to no avails the bed frame was skewed and I was passed my return window. I am extremely unhappy, I sent the manufacturer a message, I’ll update this review once the issue is rectified.
customer_reviews.author: jose mejia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful/Frame not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bed was exactly as pictured. All the parts were present and I believe it arrived early through Amazon. The assembly was not to difficult, with the instructions. The material has great quality, including the silver foot boards. However, The metal frame and the wood pieces are not sturdy or supportive. This new way of making beds and not needing box springs is just awful. After 2 months I started to see the center piece leaning and loosening. I have tightened multiple times, all to no avail. The slats are not sturdy either. They tend to pop out of place. I suggest ordering a platform/frame support for platform beds in conjunction to this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: The headboard had a small burn like area. Didn't bother me too much because it was low enough that my bed covered it once I finished assembling. Also, in the delivery option it said that the package would be brought into my apartment building but the driver made me take it all the way up by myself! He didn't even get out of the truck! But other then that, beautiful bed i would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sirai

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE LOOKING BED BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bed. soooo elegant. I'm happy with my choice but it was not easy to put it together. I put it together on my own it took foreverrr. It was hard mostly because holes were not really there so I had to make them kindof. The legs were the hardest. I've put sturdiness to the test good amount of weight in the bed at once. no issues. but the slacks on it does scare me they will give one day on me because It does not feel like sturdy wood. For the price so far worth it. and found it here on amazon cheaper than every other placed I saw it
customer_reviews.author: TEEK

customer_reviews.title: Two left panels
customer_reviews.text: The bed was an easy assembly but just my luck I got the bed with two left panels ( the sliver beaded panels on the side of the bed) I’ve reached out to the manufacturer today 3/14/19 so I will let you guys know if they contact me back
customer_reviews.author: Queen_nai

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is beautiful and very elegant looking. The bed is well made, sturdy, and will for sure last. I love the polished chrome feet and the studs gives a classy feel to the product. It was easy to assemble. It took my husband and I less than 30 minutes to finish everything. There was a little damage in the back of the footboard; it looks like a forklift damage) but I decided not to return it because it cannot be seen anyway.
customer_reviews.author: alan n.

customer_reviews.title: King Size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bed. It took me a little while to put it together by myself and using only what was provided, but definitely well worth it. Very sturdy and doesnt wiggle at all. I chose to use box springs to give it some extra height and sturdyness it work out perfectly. Couldn't be any happier! UPDATE: I have only had this bed for a few months and a button has came off. Will post pic.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forhetz

customer_reviews.title: Annoying with shipping, but overall nice bed.
customer_reviews.text: The first shipment we got of this bed was damaged so we had to send it back. The Second shipment had one of the boxes damaged as well so we mixed and matched the boxes which was kind of annoying, but it worked out. The bed is actually a very beautiful color and looks amazing . I do feel like the wooden support on the bottom could’ve been a little bit stronger, but it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K

customer_reviews.title: The gray is more Blue
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bed and great value for the money. Its sturdy and looks great. I love that the side panels are covered so when you get out of bed your legs brush against the soft fabric. The only issue I have with it is that the gray is more blue, which sucks because I either had to return the bed or paint the wall so I'm going to paint the wall. Also the fabric looks kind of shiny, not bad things just things to be aware of when trying to decorate around it.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeedrinkeranonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful! The velvet feel mixed with the nailheads and emerald green are just so perfect to me! Highly recommend. Only con for me is when attaching the slats, I had to put two fingers in black slay holders and then shove them in which was super uncomfortable, I attached a photo of black slat holders for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J. Moelter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BED!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new bed! Very lavish and exactly what I was looking for! Got the grey one and the only thing I would have to say that isn’t 100% perfection is that the grey is more of a blue-ish grey which wasn’t what i wanted and had I known that before I bought it, I would’ve gone with the creamy white one. But that’s just a personal preference...other than that I would highly recommend this bed. Very sturdy just like all the other reviews say. I got a king size and it surely makes me feel like a queen!
customer_reviews.author: asb84

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is everything. I love the color. I did buy a metal base because my husband and I are more than 100lbs and wanted to have that support. Not sure why my pictures are sideways i tried uploading them from every way. Anyway's run and don't walk to buy this bed!!! I get sooooo many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: SharronNicoleMUA

customer_reviews.title: The gray is off
customer_reviews.text: I was able to receive the bed a couple days sooner than expected. Assembly was fairly easy. Came in two boxes, undamaged. The bed feels pretty sturdy, doesn’t creek getting out of bed and appears to be pretty good quality. However, the color in certain lighting does not look as gray as I would like, definitely has a blueish look to it, debating on returning it only for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Demetra Backalukas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice looking however it sits low to the ground and doesn’t last long I’ve had this frame for a year and some how the nails went through the wood to the point it can’t be fixed just my fiancé and I sleep on the bed we don’t have any children and feel like it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, seller wants me to pay return shipping
customer_reviews.text: The grey is more of a blue-ish grey unlike the picture shows. Also, I was easily able to put my two twin adjustable bases inside without any issues. Feels sturdy and looks elegant. However, my headboard came damaged. I sent the seller a message and am waiting for a reply. Update: so the seller Cymax wants me to pay return shipping for this item. So now I’m supposed to dismantle it, box it, and pay to ship it. This is preposterous. I will never order something this expensive again online. What a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kong

customer_reviews.title: Color not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: We set up our bed today and it is a beautiful bed however I am very disappointed that the color is not at all what’s advertised. I expected the grey that was pictured and instead it is much darker with a blue tint to it. See side by side comparison of the advertised pic and what I got in the pictures I posted. Not sure if I got the wrong product, or if it’s a defect, or if all of the grey ones actually look like this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor N

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further this is the ONE!!!! I searched high and low for a bed frame I really wanted I'm very picky. I was cautious buying something this expensive on amazon but let me tell you this is SO worth it. This is fairly easy to put together but don't put it together by yourself like I did.(I couldn't wait for my husband to get home I was so excited) This is well worth the money, it is STURDY (I'm a PLUS SIZE lady) This frame is GORGEOUS and one of the best things I ever bought from amazon. If you are on the fence about this look no further just trust me.
customer_reviews.author: meagan benane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great company to purchase from. The bed frame comes in 2 boxes so doesn’t take up much space. Once the frame was built the end result was so beautiful !! It’s very sturdy and like others have said it’s a icy blue grey color so keep that in mind, I personally don’t mind it. The price was very reasonable and I would purchase from them in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Super gorgeous! at first i ordered the gray. By reading all the reviews i came to the conclusion that it wasn't going to match my wall color and my decor. Amazon customer service was so amazing to me because they stop the shipment and refund my money back immediately so i ordered the cream color i love it so much it look really elegant love the velvet look and feel😍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, but was missing a very important piece. After what felt like a lifetime putting the bed together, the last piece to hold the bed together was missing (see picture). The metal piece for the hooks to go onto, wasn’t there at all. My advice is to make sure that all the pieces are there before you put the bed together! not only the separate parts, but the hardware that’s suppose to be on the bed already!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing. Purchased the grey. It is a silvery grey, great quality, easy enough to assemble if you take your time. Delivery men were professional and polite (brought their own footies to cover their shoes, which I appreciate!) Fits my sleep number king perfectly! I LOVE amazon! Those who have seen my bed cannot believe this was only $500
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Pictures did it no justice. This bed is so beautiful!!! I got navy blue for my husband and I & it gorgeous. Not only that but the measurements were perfect , making the bed super easy to assemble. I was done in about 1 hr (mainly because I was procrastinating) ... (I also have a powered screw driver) ... yes a woman can build it too 🥰❤️
customer_reviews.author: Monet

customer_reviews.title: Meridian headboard
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new beautiful bed! It's very sturdy. I purchased a box spring because of the space with just the mattress other than that it's purfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria P. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed!!!! I agree with other reviews- I’m not sure about the color - it’s not a true/pure gray color but I still love it! It looks and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glamorous bed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok i absolutely am in love with how glamorous this bed is! Pretty easy to assemble and I love how sturdy it is. I also love the tall headboard which I was searching high and low and finally found here. It’s a platform bed so you don’t need a box spring but we prefer our bed higher so we used one. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glam!
customer_reviews.text: My DH put it together fairly easily. I helped with the slats! The final product was lovely, glamorous and seems sturdy. Love it and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bed. Love the color blue. Very easy to assemble. Quality is ok. If ure into diy projects, u can easily make this bed on ur own. I'm not sure about the sturdiness of the panels, they look flimsy. I had a box spring on it for about 5 months and nothing happened, but I just sold the box spring so we'll see how long they last under the mattress without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Casse noisette

customer_reviews.title: You’ll just be wasting your money and your time
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money ! I put the bed together . That was a hassle by its self but when we finally got it together we put the mattresses on and the mattress tilts back and forth . I’m not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Be warned, this is nothing like the photos
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed because the bed in nothing like the color in the photographs. The color is not grey, not even close. The bed is blue. I would have ordered the cream color if I would have known better. That being said, it was easy to put together and it is a sturdy bed. The only problem is that the description is inaccurate, and for $500, I expect to get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed its beautiful once you get it together. The side wings on the headboard are hard to attach and i didn't use the slats provided. I used my own because they seemed really flimsy. I used a regular box-spring with my mattress because i wanted to sat up higher. Over all i love the bed its very elegant and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Giving four stars because my package is missing two of the middle connecting pieces for the wood slates. But so far the bed is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. It does have a smokey gray/blueish tone but I like that because get matches the curtains I have. Assembly took about 3 1⁄2hours by myself (small breaks in between) and instructions were easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!! It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. I put it together myself and it was very easy. Only took me maybe a hour and a half if that. Instructions are easy. Over all a great bed! I’m very happy’
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! It’s everything I wanted! I’m always skeptical about buying things online because I like to see things in person before I buy them but I am glad I did it and I’m not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half gray half green
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the green bed, but received a green headboard but gray frame 🤷‍♀️ I’m rolling with it since I already got rid of my other bed and I don’t want to sleep on the floor during the time it would take to get the correct product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my bed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my bed! It looked exactly like the picture! All the pieces came in and I assemble it myself with the helpful instructions that were included! Would totally recommend it because it is such a sophisticated bed! Only downside of it is that the grey has a blue-ish tint to it but other than that I'm in love with my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Bed is beautiful just parts came damaged thankfully it was pieces that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed is beautiful just parts came damaged thankfully it was pieces that could be hidden..boxes were so damaged so it could've been delivery ppl
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks much nicer then pictures but I will say color differs a little I got the grey and its looks like it has a hint of blue but the color is vibrant and it comes packaged really well fast delivery and overall a great buy. Just a heads up the boxes are extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it! very sturdy and more beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie kuri

customer_reviews.title: Get this frame!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bed! It is so beautiful. The color changes with light which makes it easy to style in many different ways. It took over a month to arrive but I think COVID had something to do with that. Assembly was straight forward... took a couple hours if you're doing it alone. We are using a 10inch memory foam mattress and its perfect. So comfortable. Hardest part is matching nightstands and dresser that compete with this beauty! Definitely recommend. Great product, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle James

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love it! Great instructions! Love the icy blue grey! Make it look more expensive. Really don’t know how long it took me to put it together but didn’t take long and wasn’t hard. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha98

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed. Read many reviews and viewed many pictures before making this purchase and we are very happy. The only issue that we had was delivery did not come in the time frame that they were supposed to which was a major issue for us. The reviews are true about the color. The bed does slide on our wood floor and it says don’t push/pull or drag bed so that’s my only concern.
customer_reviews.author: TARA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter. We were extremely happy to see how pretty the bed actually is in person. I Paid for assembly of the bed that was assembled in 30 minutes. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very easy to assemble an sturdy. I put it together by myself, I’m a female. It took me a few hours. Very well made bed, looks like it cost way more then it does. It’s perfect with my decor an color pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well made sturdy bed. I looks just like the photos on amazon. I put it together with my 13 year daughter. It took us almost 2 hours. The instructions don’t have the parts labeled, just pictures, which is the only complaint I have.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie L.

customer_reviews.title: CANCEROUS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is DANGEROUS. This product can expose you to chemicals including wood dust which is known to the state of California to cause cancer or birth defect. I’m expecting a baby with my girlfriend and we can’t take any chances. I’m returning my product ASAP. Future customers READ THE LABELS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed! I got the grey and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed! I got the grey and I have to say the color is definitely different from how it looks in pictures. It’s like an icy blue color but I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedframe
customer_reviews.text: The true color doesn’t show up in the video but it’s absolutely gorgeous and a light blush velvet pink just as the display was online 😍❤️ No missing or damaged pieces and the Cerva delivery crew was super nice when I asked them if they can carry the package up a flight of apartment stairs for me. Ignore my sons yogurt on the dresser and haven’t gotten the white comforter on yet but the whole frame looks great in person! Very sturdy and took about an hour of set up time with just myself setting it up. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing to know is to view ALL PARTS of the bed for defects before you assemble bed
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bed...it was exactly what was advertised and my amazon assembler was great...
customer_reviews.author: SilJuana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the navy blue and it is beautiful. It was easy to assemble for the most part, some of my screws kept getting stuck as we were twisting them. Downside was it didn’t come with assembly instructions but my husband emailed the company and they responded very quickly. Holds up well. no moving, squeaking, cracking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product came in great condition! I put it together by myself 😎💅🏾 Took me about 3hrs due to having kids lol but it’s very sturdy, sits high like I like- I have my box spring and pillow top mattress on it so it’s higher making me love it so much more!! ❤️ I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: lakesia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Freight truck delivery-worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed. It is perfect and worth the 500$. I was also about to not buy it because that is a lot of money but I do not regret it at all. The only bad thing is if you live in a hard to find place that doesn’t show up on gps it will be hard for the delivery person to find it and you will probably have to talk them through how to get their on the phone. Or if you live in a small apartment complex like me. A huge semi delivers it. Worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Serena r.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made online hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed it’s Very sturdy and stylish. The cream color is beautiful I have no complaints it’s really nice and I love how it upgraded the look in my room while giving me the support I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed but color is off
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful! However, upon unpacking the bed I noticed damages to the fabric, markings. It’s not that noticeable so I’m not going to bother to return. The main problem is the color. It’s not the light gray as advertised in the photos. It’s more like a blue-gray. Also, the screws and washers were not labeled for assembly and instructions are not great.
customer_reviews.author: SHINDA

customer_reviews.title: NOT GRAY
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with my purchase. The gray color is more "blue" than gray. I'm sad that this is the case. Sadly, I don't want to deal with returning it. So I am going to "deal" with it, but hopefully I can save you from the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetsation

customer_reviews.title: Color is more emerald - not as dark as it appears
customer_reviews.text: Bed is great quality- took myself & boyfriend about 1.5 hours to assemble. My only complaint is the green is not as dark as it appears as i had hoped. In natural light- much more bright and not as “forest” or “hunter” green- more of an emerald jewel color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color gray is much darker in person.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Not to difficult to assemble. Upset that the gray is darker than the picture in person. Its more like a dark gray/blueish color.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is fantastic. Put it together by myself (highly recommend a drill, although it comes with an Allen wrench and small ratchet that will also get the job done) in about 2 hours. Sturdy, gorgeous, soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to attach wing pieces for the headboard. Extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Russ

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this bed its sturdy and beautifully made. I have the grey color and its very rich looking, some ppl says it looks bluish which it does depending on what lighting up under but overall its a beautiful color and designed bed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good bed. My family like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. At some point, I have taken help from my mother but most of the works were done by myself. Easy to assemble, nice and elegant looking and I had been using this for a few weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Saifur

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bed.
customer_reviews.text: The bed came a week earlier than it was supposed to and I was able to put it together mostly alone. It’s beautiful 😍
customer_reviews.author: Semekia

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before ordering this bed, the posts said it was a little darker or lighter but when i received my bed ( Pink) it was way off. Its more of a lavender color. Not what i expected at all, i'm only keeping it because the shipping/return process is a hassle. Also scheduled a delivery time but was not aware they wont bring it to your apartment, its only curbside drop off. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniffer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous for the price. Well made. Took two people to assemble easily in 90 minutes. Would be a bigger challenge with one person. Very sturdy and looks much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bed! It is super comfy, the velvet feels AMAZING and it’s so elegant. Assembling was easy and it is very sturdy (they handle my 6’5’’, 350lb husband just fine). Would totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was right, it took 2-3 hour to assemble. Overall I love my bed, I bought King Size and it fits perfect. I love the color and the material. This was my birthday gift to myself. I received a lot of compliments too !! I love it I bought a metal platform frame cause the wood slats wasn’t sturdy but it’s cool
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Color not as picture is way more yellow so it looks cheap , and returning is a hazle other than that had a good build easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amgy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and nice product! I bought pink king size. That’s so beautiful! And my kids said the bed is so soft :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very beautiful. I have had this bed for a little less than a month and it’s great! I would’ve given it 5 stars but the setup instructions were a little confusing at first. Took me hours to put together (with breaks of course) alone. Def should be a 2 person job! Overall, I am happy and it’s looks great in my studio apartment! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Love it but came with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this frame. It is almost perfect. My only problem is that it got slightly damaged during shipment. The frame came in a worn box that had some holes. Luckily the damage was not anywhere visible after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! We shopped around at local stores before purchasing this bed frame and this was by far the beat value. Easy to assemble just takes some time. We have a 12 inch foam serta mattress on this with no box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed, but some of the hardware needed to put it together was missing. I have to go to the hardware store to get the right size bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ray Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not grey as is looks! Opened a silver blue bed.
customer_reviews.text: Not grey. I thought I was getting a grey bed however this bed is a “silvery blue” colored piece of furniture. At first glance, you’d say, “Look at that pretty blue bed.” Would be great...if that’s what I wanted. I was decorating the room around a “blush and grey” color palette and this bed is soooo blue that I have to repaint my blush colored walls. Or return the bed. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: SRR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but has its problems unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify the base. The screws are to weak when pushed around. It also came damaged luckily I guess it was behind the headboard. Cost to much to be damaged and to have to be modify.
customer_reviews.author: just a robot shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful and worth the money but unfortunately it did not work/match with our home decor. The description says it grey but it has a blue undertone and that is why it did not work for us. But it's really lovely bed.
customer_reviews.author: Schotty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to put together. I’m 5’5 115 and i put it together by myself. Looks sturdy but we will see when i get the mattress and test it out. It is true cream
customer_reviews.author: Sevena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: The back of the headboard came ripped see picture . It’s disappointing . Other than that the color blue is beautiful and the bed looks nice .
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Color is not as pictured. This not a true grey. It’s more of a blue grey.
customer_reviews.author: Dandrea

customer_reviews.title: Better than photo- diva bed
customer_reviews.text: Got these got master and guest room- needed 5 inch box spring because too low for my liking- Great value- Hollywood glam. Love this and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: spencer788

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this was super super easy to put together, but between two people it took about an hour. The sturdiness of the bed in regard to just sleeping and rolling around is perfect! Barely moves. During other activities, the headboard isn't the sturdiest but it's not too bad. Barely moves, just thought someone would be interested in a review on that. Overall i get a lot of compliments as to the color of the bed and where I got it from!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was alot of work to put together,however was worth it in the end. The assembly took a little over 2 hours,but that's only because my mother and I aren't the best at putting furniture together. My only complaint is that my head board came with a dent at the top,plus I was expecting the headboard to be of better quality for the price,other than that it's a great bed. P.S. I opted to use a box spring for a sturdier foundation and piece of mind when I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: A great bed for the price. It was tedious to assemble. But overall, a nice bed!
customer_reviews.author: LuvHeels24

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, just wish the headboard was taller😕
customer_reviews.text: Love this head board, it is easy to set up with two people. I wish it were about a foot taller, when you make the bed up with pillows it’s hard to see the head board which is absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Alaine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee the color & material. It’s really the best feature in my bedroom. Shipping was fast, 2 days than expected. Assembly was easy, overall it took around 2.5 hours. Added a boxspring for height and the slats support pretty well. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: GAW-JUS 🤩!!
customer_reviews.text: Looove my bed. Simple assembly and sturdy construction. No complaints whatsoever. I added the Zinus Jayanna 4 Inch BiFold Box Spring for some height and it's perfection. Don't hesitate. Buy this bed!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiL

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for guest bedroom for the price. Very sturdy considering it not solid wood. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: khanh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed omg
customer_reviews.text: Love my bed they just shorted me out of some washers but I went to the hardware store and bought more.
customer_reviews.author: jade2010

product_meta.title: Meridian Furniture AidenNavy-K Aiden Collection Modern | Contemporary Velvet Upholstered Bed with Deep Button Tufting, Solid Wood Frame, and Custom Chrome Legs, King, Navy
product_meta.description: Size:King| Color:NavyElegant and eye-catching, the stunning Aiden bed from Meridian Furniture is the perfect addition to any bedroom. Rich velvet covers the deep tufted design. A beautiful wing bed design is complimented by hand applied chrome nail head details. Strength and beauty is with a solid wood frame and stainless steel legs.
feature_bullets: Modern | Contemporary Wing Design with Deep Detailed Tufting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars437 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
